models.name: qalign

models.name: mcp-github-pr-issue-analyser
models.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) application for automated GitHub PR analysis and issue management. Enables LLMs to fetch PR details, analyse diffs, manage issues, and handle releases through a standardised interface

models.description: Convert SEC EDGAR filings, exhibits, and press releases to clean, LLM-ready Markdown. Page-aware. Section-aware. Table-preserving. Built for retrieval and reasoning.

models.name: GTR-Bench
models.description: A new benchmark for evaluating spatial-temporal intelligence of Vision-Language Models (VLMs).

models.name: AI-Tweet-Generator-for-Your-Own-Style
models.description: This project is a fun, beginner-friendly AI tool that fine-tunes a small language model (like GPT-2) on your personal tweets to generate new ones in your unique style.

models.description: üìù Enhance large language model outputs by revealing assumptions with a structured scratchpad to reduce hallucination and improve accuracy.

models.name: LLM-DS
models.description: domain-flexible autonomous data analysis agent leveraging large language models

models.name: llmops-py

models.name: agentdeck-preview
models.description: AgentDeck is a research platform for studying AI behavior through game scenarios. Run controlled experiments with LLMs, collect comprehensive behavioral data, and replay matches for analysis. üöß Preview release - feedback welcome.

models.name: ReleaseNotesRec-Agent
models.description: An AI-powered Release Notes & Feedback Analysis Agent built using LangChain, ChromaDB, and LLMs. It collects release notes, Reddit feedback, and real-world user issues, performs sentiment/topic analysis, and delivers accurate insights through a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) workflow.

models.name: aes-llm-era-benchmark
models.description: Public release of the AES LLM Era Benchmark

models.name: Release-openrouter-browser-use
models.description: Welcome to the Workflow AI Agent! This application allows you to create and execute powerful AI workflows using a visual interface. It integrates with OpenRouter for LLM access and Browser-Use for autonomous web navigation.

models.name: mlc-llm-devops
models.description: Production-grade DevOps workflow for the MLC-LLM project, including a multipurpose Docker image, automated testing, cross-platform builds, and CI/CD pipelines that publish artifacts to GHCR and GitHub Releases.

models.description: AI tasks that interact with LLMs and MCP servers

models.name: ReleaseRiskAnalyserAgent
models.description: Code Risk Analyser Agent

models.name: fake_news_detector
models.description: A simple model for fake news detection in all languages

models.name: prompt_detection
models.description: Large Language Models are vulnerable to prompt injection and jailbreak attacks that bypass safety controls. Existing solutions rely on weak rules and fail on new threats. This project builds a multi-layer AI firewall to detect, block, and explain malicious prompts in real time.

models.name: coreference_resolution_spanish
models.description: This work proposes a hybrid approach that leverages the advantages of English-language models to obtain coreferences in Spanish. Furthermore, due to the lack of annotated data in Spanish, a new coreference dataset for Spanish texts is proposed to support the evaluation of the system.

models.name: AI-Language-Coach
models.description: üöÄ An AI-powered chatbot that helps users learn new languages through interactive conversations. Built using OpenAI models and LangChain, it provides real-time feedback, tracks user mistakes in SQLite, and offers personalized learning insights.

models.name: Fake_news_prediction
models.description: üì∞ Fake News Detection using Machine Learning  This project is a Fake News Classification System developed using Python, Machine Learning techniques, and Natural Language Processing (NLP). The goal is to detect misinformation by analyzing written content such as headlines or full news articles.  The model classifies news into two categories:

models.name: symphony
models.description: New model language for G-Cubed

models.name: Fake-News-Detection-System
models.description: This project is an end-to-end Fake News Detection System built using Python, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing (NLP). The application allows users to paste any news headline or article and predicts whether the news is FAKE or REAL along with a confidence score. The trained model is deployed using a Streamlit web application.

models.name: Amharic-News-Classification-with-Multilingual-Transformers.
models.description: Amharic News Classification with Multilingual Transformers. This repository contains three transformer-based models for classifying Amharic news articles. The models leverage state-of-the-art multilingual language models to effectively handle the Amharic language.

models.name: Pre-train_OneRestore_with_new_dataset
models.description: OneRestore is enhanced with deep Multimodal Large Language Model (MLLM) integration. MLLMs, such as E5-V or OpenAI models, are combined to generate richer, contextual scene descriptions from degraded images and user prompts.

models.name: PunithaBot---News-Research
models.description: LLM-powered news research assistant that retrieves, analyzes, and summarizes news articles using advanced language models.

models.name: Training-and-evaluating-cognitive-language-models
models.description: For training a cognitive language model with new datasets.

models.name: val-ai
models.description: Val is a system based on the utilization of large language models (LLMs) to perform a variety of tasks. The system is designed to be modular, and to allow for the easy addition of new models and tasks.
